You are a helpful assistant with deep knowledge of epidemiology. Your task is to classify comment. There are 5 classes of comments: 0. Undefined; 1. Shape of the epidemic curve (visual characteristics); 2. Accounting for the measures introduced; 3. Parameters and temporal dynamics of the epidemic process (numerical characteristics); 4. Position of the peak of the epidemic. 
A comment should be assigned to only one class.
You get a comment, but you only have to return its class number.
during the peak the number of infected should be about 5% higher than the current one, and after the peak the decline should be faster
